title: In other countries pixel 3a wl available for $399=27800 INR. But in india its going to 39,999INR Why
content: Why indians need to pay so much cost for pixel 3a?. Not like others. Other country people can get for $399 which is equal to 27,930 INR.  But in india its going to sell at 39,999INR. Why so much difference. Totally 12,000 INR  for single handset. Just think about how much buyers in india you got. Simply, why this too much cost difference?. Tell me the reason.
